TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UriBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 为统一资源标识符 (URI) 提供自定义构造函数，并修改 类的 URI。

span.span: Provides a custom constructor for uniform resource identifiers (URIs) and modifies URIs for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种简便方式修改内容而无需创建一个新的实例为每次修改的实例。The class provides a convenient way to modify the contents of a instance without creating a new instance for each modification. 属性可用来为只读的读/写访问属性，以便可以修改。The properties provide read/write access to the read-only properties so that they can be modified.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数创建的新实例，如下所示初始化其属性的类。The default constructor creates a new instance of the class with its properties initialized as follows. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |FragmentFragment|| |HostHost|"环回""loopback"| |PasswordPassword|| |路径Path|"/""/"| |端口Port|-1-1| |查询Query|| |方案Scheme|"http""http"| |UserNameUserName||

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string uri) cil managed

span.span: A URI string.

summary.span: 用指定的 URI 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化的新实例类，该类具有， ， ， ， ， ，和属性设置为指定中`uri`.This constructor initializes a new instance of the class with the , , , , , , and properties set as specified in `uri`. 如果`uri`未指定一种方案，则方案默认为"http:"。If `uri` does not specify a scheme, the scheme defaults to "http:".

span.span: is .

Docs.exception:
在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获基类异常 。In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, , instead.
字符串长度为零或只包含空格。
is a zero length string or contains only spaces.
或-or-
分析例程检测到格式无效的架构。The parsing routine detected a scheme in an invalid form.
或-or-
分析器在不使用 "file" 架构的 URI 中检测到两个以上的连续斜杠。The parser detected more than two consecutive slashes in a URI that does not use the "file" scheme.
或-or-
不是有效的 URI。 is not a valid URI.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified scheme and host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例已初始化与属性设置为`schemeName`和属性设置为`hostName`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName` and the property set to `hostName`. 初始化为值-1 以指示应使用方案，默认端口和属性设置为包含斜杠字符 （/）。 is initialized to the value -1 to indicate the default port for the scheme should be used, and the property is set to the slash character (/). ## Examples 下面的示例创建实例，其中包含 URI http://www.contoso.com/。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com/. [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder3 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An Internet access protocol.

param.name: host
param.span: DNS 样式的域名或 IP 地址。

span.span: A DNS-style domain name or IP address.

param.span: 服务的 IP 端口号。

summary.span: 用指定的方案、主机和端口初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified scheme, host, and port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例已初始化与属性设置为`schemeName`、属性设置为`hostName`，和属性设置为`portNumber`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, and the property set to `portNumber`. 属性设置为包含斜杠字符 （/）。The property is set to the slash character (/). 如果`portNumber`设置为值为-1，这表示默认端口值`scheme`将用于连接到`host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建实例，其中包含 URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/. [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified scheme, host, port number, path and query string or fragment identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例已初始化与属性设置为`schemeName`、属性设置为`hostName`、属性设置为`portNumber`，和属性设置为`pathValue`.The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, the property set to `portNumber`, and the property is set to `pathValue`. 如果`extraValue`开头数字符号 （#），然后设置为`extraValue`。If `extraValue` begins with a number sign (#), then is set to `extraValue`. 如果`extraValue`用问号 （？），然后开始设置为`extraValue`。If `extraValue` begins with a question mark (?), then is set to `extraValue`. 如果`portNumber`设置为值为-1，这表示默认端口值`scheme`将用于连接到`host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建实例，其中包含 URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm#top。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm#top. [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if represents the same as the constructed by this instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法比较指定实例与实例生成的实例。The method compares a specified instance with the instance built by the instance. 如果两个相同，方法返回`true`。If the two are the same, the method returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Fragment { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 的段部分。

span.span: Gets or sets the fragment portion of the URI.
The fragment portion of the URI.

value.span: 段标识符 ("#") 添加到段的开头。

span.span: The fragment identifier ("#") is added to the beginning of the fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含跟中包括标记本身的 URI 的片段标记 （#） 的任何文本。The property contains any text following a fragment marker (#) in the URI, including the marker itself. 设置时属性，片段标记添加到其值。When setting the property, the fragment marker is added to its value. **请注意**版本 1.0 和 1.1 版.NET Framework 中，设置中属性设置为任何值，包括`null`、 清除属性与设置属性`null`或清除该属性。**Note** In version 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, setting the property to any value, including `null`, cleared the property, and setting the property to `null` or to cleared the property. 在 2.0 版中，但是，和属性无关。In version 2.0, however, the and properties are independent. **请注意**不将字符串追加直接到此属性。**Note** Do not append a string directly to this property. 如果的长度大于 1，检索字符串形式的属性值、 删除前导井号、 追加新的查询字符串中，和设置使用组合字符串属性。If the length of is greater than 1, retrieve the property value as a string, remove the leading pound sign, append the new query string, and set the property with the combined string. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 URI"http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main"。The following example creates the URI "http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main". [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 返回 URI 的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns the hash code for the URI.

returns.span: 为 URI 生成的哈希代码。

span.span: The hash code generated for the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包括任何段生成的哈希代码。The hash code is generated without including any fragment. Urihttp://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search和http://www.contoso.com/index.htm生成相同的哈希代码。The URIs http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search and http://www.contoso.com/index.htm generate the same hash code. 哈希代码的A 和 B 保证都是相同 A.Equals(B) 时`true`。The hash codes for A and B are guaranteed to be the same when A.Equals(B) is `true`. 此方法实现 。This method implements .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Host { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器的域名系统 (DNS) 主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the Domain Name System (DNS) host name or IP address of a server.

value.span: 服务器的域名系统 (DNS) 主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: The DNS host name or IP address of the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的完全限定的 DNS 主机名或的服务器的 IP 地址。The property contains the fully qualified DNS host name or IP address of the server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与访问 URI 的用户关联的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets the password associated with the user that accesses the URI.

value.span: 访问 URI 的用户的密码。

span.span: The password of the user that accesses the URI.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 引用的资源的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the resource referenced by the URI.

value.span: URI 引用的资源的路径。

span.span: The path to the resource referenced by the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含服务器用来解析请求信息的路径信息。The property contains the path information that the server uses to resolve requests for information. 这通常是服务器的文件系统; 上所需的信息的路径尽管它也可能表明应用程序或服务器必须运行以提供的信息的脚本。Typically this is the path to the desired information on the server's file system; although it also can indicate the application or script that the server must run to provide the information. 路径信息不包括方案、 主机名或查询 URI 部分。The path information does not include the scheme, host name, or query portion of the URI. 属性始终返回至少为斜杠 （/）。The property always returns at least a slash (/).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Port { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 的端口号。

span.span: Gets or sets the port number of the URI.
The port number of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 端口号定义用于联系主机 URI 中引用的协议端口。The port number defines the protocol port for contacting the host referenced in the URI. 如果端口未指定的 URI 的一部分为属性返回的值-1 以指示的协议方案的默认端口值将用于连接到的主机。If a port is not specified as part of the URI, the property returns the value of -1 to indicate that the default port value for the protocol scheme will be used to connect to the host. 如果属性设置为值-1，这表明协议方案的默认端口值将用于连接到的主机。If the property is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the protocol scheme will be used to connect to the host.

exception.span: 不能将此端口设为小于 1 或大于 65,535 的值。

span.span: The port cannot be set to a value less than -1 or greater than 65,535.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Query { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 中包括的任何查询信息。

span.span: Gets or sets any query information included in the URI.

value.span: URI 中包括的查询信息。

span.span: The query information included in the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在 URI 中包括的任何查询信息。The property contains any query information included in the URI. 查询信息分开问号 （？） 的路径信息，并一直到 URI 的末尾。Query information is separated from the path information by a question mark (?) and continues to the end of the URI. 返回的查询信息包括前导问号。The query information returned includes the leading question mark. 根据 RFC 2396 转义查询信息。The query information is escaped according to RFC 2396. **请注意**版本 1.0 和 1.1 版.NET Framework 中，设置中属性设置为任何值，包括`null`、 清除属性与设置属性`null`或清除该属性。**Note** In version 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, setting the property to any value, including `null`, cleared the property, and setting the property to `null` or to cleared the property. 在 2.0 版中，但是，和属性无关。In version 2.0, however, the and properties are independent. **请注意**不将字符串追加直接到此属性。**Note** Do not append a string directly to this property. 如果的长度大于 1，检索字符串形式的属性值、 删除前导问号、 追加新的查询字符串中，和设置使用组合字符串属性。If the length of is greater than 1, retrieve the property value as a string, remove the leading question mark, append the new query string, and set the property with the combined string. ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性。The following example sets the property. [!code-cpp[UriBuilderSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/UriBuilderSample/cpp/main.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UriBuilderSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/UriBuilderSample/cs/main.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 的方案名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the scheme name of the URI.
The scheme of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的有效的方案名称属性。The following table lists the valid scheme names for the property. |方案Scheme|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |文件file|资源是本地计算机上的文件。The resource is a file on the local computer.| |ftpftp|通过 FTP 访问资源。The resource is accessed through FTP.| |gophergopher|通过 Gopher 协议访问资源。The resource is accessed through the Gopher protocol.| |httphttp|通过 HTTP 访问的资源。The resource is accessed through HTTP.| |httpshttps|通过 SSL 加密的 HTTP 访问的资源。The resource is accessed through SSL-encrypted HTTP.| |mailtomailto|资源是电子邮件地址，并通过 SMTP 访问。The resource is an email address and is accessed through SMTP.| |newsnews|通过 NNTP 访问资源。The resource is accessed through NNTP.|

exception.span: 不能将该方案设为无效的方案名称。

span.span: The scheme cannot be set to an invalid scheme name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回指定 实例的显示字符串。

span.span: Returns the display string for the specified instance.

returns.span: 包含 非转义显示字符串的字符串。

span.span: The string that contains the unescaped display string of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示字符串包含属性值如果属性已设置或指定的端口时构造时使用的接受的情况除外的端口号参数的方法时属性来值被设置为值-1 以指示默认端口。The display string contains the property value if the property was set or the port was specified when the was constructed using of the methods that accept a port number parameter except for the case when the .property value was set to a value of -1 to indicate the default port. 显示字符串不包含就像属性值未设置属性和一个端口未指定时构造的。The display string does not contain the property value if the property was not set and a port was not specified when the was constructed. 显示字符串也不包含属性值如果构造函数的属性或端口号设置为值-1。The display string also does not contain the property value if the property or port number for the constructor was set to a value of -1.

para.span: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获基类异常 。

span.span: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, , instead.
The instance has a bad password.
